snippet: A court charged a prominent opposition politician, Moulana Delwar Hossain Sayedi, on Monday with war crimes in the country’s 1971 war of independence from Pakistan.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

lead_paragraph: A court charged a prominent opposition politician, Moulana Delwar Hossain Sayedi, on Monday with war crimes in the country’s 1971 war of independence from Pakistan.

headline.main: Bangladesh: Opposition Leader Charged With Crimes in 1971 Independence War
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh: Opposition Leader Charged With Crimes in 1971 Independence War
